actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the 1954 Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction for charitable contributions to fraternal organizations for the purpose of constructing and maintaining their buildings.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an estate, gift and income tax deduction for charitable contributions to fraternal organizations used for the construction or maintenance of their buildings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the 1954 Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction for charitable contributions to fraternal organizations for the purpose of constructing and maintaining their buildings.
